            public void AddSaga_OrderSaga_e02a35d0173ba1fe()
            {
                System.ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull(endpointConfiguration);
                var sagaMetadataCollection = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(endpointConfiguration)
                   .GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadataCollection>();
                var associatedMessages = new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage[]
                {
                    new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::OrderCreated), true, false),
                    new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::OrderShipped), false, false),
                };
                var metadata = NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadata.Create<global::OrderSaga, global::OrderSagaData>(associatedMessages);
                sagaMetadataCollection.Add(metadata);

                var messageHandlerRegistry = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(endpointConfiguration)
                   .GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::OrderSaga, global::OrderCreated>();
                messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::OrderSaga, global::OrderShipped>();
